content: कर्मिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Working, active, busy. {@--2@} Engaged in any work or business. {@--3@} One who performs religious deeds with the expectation of reward or recompense; कर्मिभ्यश्चाधिको योगी तस्माद्योगी भवार्जुन <ls>Bg. 6. 46.</ls> {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} A mechanic, artisan; <ls>Y. 2. 265.</ls>
